attributes.action: Future general elections to have on the ballot a 'No Confidence' vote.
attributes.additional_details: As MP's have done with the Government, we the people should be able to show that we have no confidence in Parliament, thereby have a better representative democracy.
attributes.background: To inscribe into law, that future elections will give the people of the UK the option on the ballot, that they have no confidence in their local candidates for Parliament or the parties that they represent.
